price: ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ យើងបានលំអមេឃជាន់ទីមួយនៃផែនដី លំអដោយផ្កាយជាច្រើន។
arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: innā zayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bizīnatin al-kawākibi
